original_title: Younger brother hacks elder brother to death
original_body_lines: A 25-year-old man from Polonnaruwa was hacked to death by his younger brother at their home at Peletiyawa in Polonnaruwa last night.
Police said the younger brother had reportedly stabbed his elder brother following an argument.
The injured victim was admitted to the Dehiaththakandiya Hospital where he succumbed to his injuries later.
Investigations revealed that the younger brother was receiving treatment for a mental health disorder.
